readable.title: 2687328779_b4356dab16
readable.content: A dog is being squirted with a hose as it jumps into a paddling pool . A dog is hosed as it jumps into a kiddie pool . A terrier is sprayed by a hose while jumping in a pool . A white dog with black patches runs jumps through a spray from a hose into a blue plastic wading pool . While one white dog is outside the pool , another white dog with a black spot on its back is jumping into a plastic swimming pool while getting sprayed by a garden hose .
